channel.title: AI on Etsub Feleke
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Etsub Feleke

item.title: Cognitive Canvas : Exploring the Model Context Protocol (MCP).
item.description: Cognitive Canvas is an MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server that acts as a persistent memory layer for Claude Desktop and Copilot. It allows the AI to save URLs, categorize content, and generate quizzes for active recall.

item.title: Auto-Bench : Benchmarking Multi-Tool LLM Agents
item.description: Auto Bench is a reproducible benchmarking framework that evaluates multi-tool LLM agents by measuring their process (tool selection, reasoning, action sequencing), not just outcomes.
